modName: Twiggys Colourful Barkeeps and CHSBHC bouncing meshes
summary: A simple texture replacer for the Barkeep Clothes. A choice between Red, Purple or Light blue checker pattern.  Comes with optional bouncing breast meshes.
descriptionHtml:
This mod just replaces the default texture of barkeep clothes with something a little more lively. you can chose between Red, Blue and Purple.  Also comes with an optional mesh for bouncing (and tastefully enlarged!) breasts.

Installation is quick, safe and easy. Detailed instructions are included for those new to modding.


---------------------------------

OPTIONAL FILE REQUIREMENTS:
Requires CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics- 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888
by CherryHotaling


Hi Rez / Low Rez: I added the choice for Hi-rez, but I don\'t think it\'s much different. The choice is up to you. Low res is 512x512, and hi res is 1024x1024.


USAGE

Be my guest if you want to use this in anything when we finally get a construction set to play with :D
author: Twiggy
